title: ‘I’m Gutted’: Tom Pidcock in Rare Near-Miss in Tour de France Gravel Epic
content:
In a sport where winning is the only thing that counts, Pidcock, Gee and Stuyven struggled to make sense of the finish-line disappointment: 'I saw the line, I saw clean air and I thought, I’ve got this.'

Read the full article at ‘I’m Gutted’: Tom Pidcock in Rare Near-Miss in Tour de France Gravel Epic on Velo.
author: ahood
